participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is driven by her dreams of becoming a lawyer and is deeply connected to her rural roots.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Jake loves to engage in lively conversations about his interests, especially sports and music.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.
